Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2010...
Injured on 7/30/2010 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/12/2012 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2013, off Francisco Liriano (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/2013, off Jeff Niemann (SEA)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Kansas City on 6/25/2014...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 2014...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 2015...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Chicago (A) on 6/24/2018...
Traded from Cleveland to Cincinnati on 5/30/2019 (Going to CIN: P J. Papelbon, CF A. Wates. Going to CLE: P D. Muniz, CF S. West Jr., P A. Roush)...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Injured on 6/29/2021 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (N) on 7/7/2021...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
Injured on 8/19/2022 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 2022...
